summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, establishing procedures for application of incentive provisions for affordable housing; amending sections 23.30.010, 23.34.008, 23.40.020, 23.45.502, 23.45.510, 23.47A.002, 23.47A.013, 23.58A.002, 23.58A.014, 23.84A.018 of the Seattle Municipal Code; and adding new Sections 23.58A.025, 23.58A.026, and 23.58A.028.
